elements.name: survey_preamble_header_and_text
elements.html:
School Leadership Program - Intro Workshop Post-Survey

Congratulations! You've completed a Code.org School Leadership Program Workshop!

This survey asks questions about your experience today. 

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share de-identified, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your de-identified responses will be used by Code.org, our Regional Partners, and our facilitators for program improvement.

This survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.  Your complete honesty and candor are appreciated.

elements.Natalia_comment: ******NOTE: SLP will have 1 intro call during the summer and 4 quarterly calls during the academic year
elements.title: After participating in this workshop, I have a better understanding of what Computer Science is and what it isn't.

choices.text: Yes, I have a better understanding after attending the workshop.
I had a strong understanding before attending the workshop and it didn't change.
I am confused about what Computer Science is and what it isn't.

elements.name: cs_rollout_next_steps
elements.title: After participating in this workshop, I know the next steps to ensure a successful rollout of Computer Science courses in my school.

elements.name: cs_rollout_supports
elements.title: I have access to adequate resources to support a successful rollout of Computer Science courses in my school.

elements.name: college_board_deadlines
elements.title: I know what I need to do at my school to meet the College Board deadlines for students to take the AP exam.

elements.html:
Thanks from Code.org for your time, commitment and passion for teaching {workshop_course} this year.

You are making a difference for your students. We're looking forward to what's next. Onward!
